education.title: Understanding Credit Utilization and Your Score
education.description: Learn how credit utilization affects your credit score and strategies to improve it. Discover the 30% rule and how paying down balances can boost your score.

education.title: Debt Avalanche vs Snowball: Which is Right for You?
education.description: Compare two popular debt payoff strategies and choose the one that fits your situation. Learn when to prioritize high interest vs. quick wins.

education.title: Setting Up Autopay to Avoid Late Fees
education.description: Step-by-step guide to setting up automatic payments and avoiding costly late fees. Protect your credit score and save money on penalties.

education.title: How to Negotiate Lower Interest Rates
education.description: Practical tips for calling your credit card company to request lower APRs. Learn what to say and when to call for the best results.

partner_offers.title: Chase Slate Edge - Balance Transfer Card
partner_offers.description: 0% APR for 18 months on balance transfers, $0 transfer fee for first 60 days. Perfect for consolidating high-interest debt.
partner_offers.impact: Could save up to $500+ in interest charges over 18 months

partner_offers.title: Citi Diamond Preferred - Balance Transfer Card
partner_offers.description: 0% APR for 21 months on balance transfers. Longer promotional period for larger debt consolidation.
partner_offers.impact: Could save up to $750+ in interest charges over 21 months

education.title: Budgeting with Irregular Income
education.description: Learn the 50/30/20 rule adapted for variable income. Discover how to create a flexible budget that works with fluctuating paychecks.

education.title: Building an Emergency Fund on Variable Pay
education.description: Strategies for building a 3-6 month emergency fund when your income varies. Learn to save during high-earning months.

education.title: Income Smoothing Strategies
education.description: Techniques to smooth out income fluctuations, including setting aside money in high months and creating a buffer account.

education.title: Managing Cash Flow Gaps
education.description: How to handle periods between paychecks when income is delayed. Learn about short-term solutions and long-term planning.

partner_offers.title: YNAB (You Need A Budget)
partner_offers.description: Budgeting app designed for variable income. Helps you plan ahead and build buffers for lean months.
partner_offers.impact: Better cash flow management and reduced financial stress

partner_offers.title: EveryDollar Budgeting App
partner_offers.description: Zero-based budgeting app perfect for tracking irregular income. Free version available with premium features.

education.title: The Complete Subscription Audit Checklist
education.description: Step-by-step guide to reviewing all your subscriptions. Learn how to identify forgotten services and evaluate value.

education.title: How to Negotiate or Cancel Subscriptions
education.description: Practical tips for canceling subscriptions and negotiating better rates. Learn when to cancel vs. when to negotiate.

education.title: Setting Up Bill Alerts and Reminders
education.description: How to set up automated reminders for subscription renewals and avoid surprise charges. Use calendar and banking alerts.

education.title: Bundling Services to Save Money
education.description: Learn how to bundle similar services (streaming, cloud storage) to reduce costs. Compare bundle options vs. individual subscriptions.

partner_offers.title: Rocket Money - Subscription Manager
partner_offers.description: Automatically tracks and manages your subscriptions. Helps you cancel unused services and negotiate better rates.
partner_offers.impact: Could save $50-200/month by identifying and canceling unused subscriptions

partner_offers.title: Truebill - Subscription Tracking
partner_offers.description: Monitors your subscriptions and alerts you to price increases. Can help cancel services and get refunds.
partner_offers.impact: Could save $30-150/month by managing subscriptions more effectively

education.title: Setting SMART Financial Goals
education.description: Learn to set Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, and Time-bound financial goals. Create a roadmap for your savings journey.

education.title: Automating Your Savings
education.description: Set up automatic transfers to build savings effortlessly. Learn about pay-yourself-first strategies and savings automation tools.

education.title: High-Yield Savings Accounts Explained
education.description: Understanding high-yield savings accounts (HYSAs) and how they can boost your savings growth. Compare rates and features.

education.title: Introduction to CDs and Bonds
education.description: Learn about certificates of deposit (CDs) and bonds as options for growing your savings. Understand risk, return, and liquidity trade-offs.

education.title: Building an Emergency Fund: How Much is Enough?
education.description: Determine the right emergency fund size for your situation. Learn when 3 months is enough vs. when you need 6+ months.

partner_offers.title: Marcus by Goldman Sachs - High-Yield Savings
partner_offers.description: 4.40% APY with no minimum balance. FDIC insured up to $250,000. Perfect for growing your emergency fund.
partner_offers.impact: Could earn $200-500+ more in interest per year compared to traditional savings

partner_offers.title: Ally Bank - High-Yield Savings Account
partner_offers.description: 4.35% APY with no monthly maintenance fees. Easy online access and mobile app for managing your savings.
partner_offers.impact: Could earn $150-400+ more in interest per year compared to traditional savings

education.title: Understanding Opportunity Cost
education.description: Learn how every spending decision has an opportunity cost. See how small daily expenses add up to significant lost savings potential.

education.title: Retirement Savings Gap Calculator
education.description: Calculate how much you need to save for retirement and identify any gaps. Learn about retirement savings benchmarks by age.

education.title: Tax-Advantaged Account Guide (401k, IRA, HSA)
education.description: Comprehensive guide to 401(k)s, IRAs, and HSAs. Learn how to maximize tax benefits and grow wealth faster.

education.title: Building Wealth on a High Income
education.description: Strategies for high earners to build wealth effectively. Learn about investment strategies, tax optimization, and wealth preservation.

education.title: The 20% Savings Rule for High Earners
education.description: Why saving 20% of income is crucial for high earners. Learn how to redirect discretionary spending to wealth-building.

partner_offers.title: Fidelity - Investment Account
partner_offers.description: Low-cost investment platform with comprehensive retirement planning tools. Perfect for maximizing tax-advantaged savings.
partner_offers.impact: Could save thousands in fees and optimize retirement contributions

partner_offers.title: Vanguard - Low-Cost Index Funds
partner_offers.description: Access to low-cost index funds and ETFs. Ideal for long-term wealth building with minimal fees.
partner_offers.impact: Could save $500-2000+ annually in fees compared to high-cost funds
